com.hissain.jscipy.math

Class RK4Solver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hissain.jscipy.math.RK4Solver

  • public class RK4Solver
extends java.lang.Object
    Runge-Kutta 4th Order Method for solving ODEs Usage similar to Python's scipy.integrate.odeint

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  RK4Solver.DifferentialEquation
      Functional interface for defining the differential equation dy/dt = f(t, y)
      static class  RK4Solver.Solution
      Result class to hold the solution

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public RK4Solver.Solution solve(RK4Solver.DifferentialEquation f,
                                double y0,
                                double t0,
                                double tf,
                                double h)
        Solve ODE using RK4 method
        Parameters:
        f - The differential equation dy/dt = f(t, y)
        y0 - Initial condition
        t0 - Initial time
        tf - Final time
        h - Step size
        Returns:
        Solution object containing t and y arrays

      • solve

        public RK4Solver.Solution solve(RK4Solver.DifferentialEquation f,
                                double y0,
                                double[] tSpan)
        Solve ODE using RK4 method with specified time points. Uses internal sub-stepping for improved accuracy when time points are sparse.
        Parameters:
        f - The differential equation dy/dt = f(t, y)
        y0 - Initial condition
        tSpan - Array of time points where solution is desired
        Returns:
        Solution object containing t and y arrays

      • solve

        public RK4Solver.Solution solve(RK4Solver.DifferentialEquation f,
                                double y0,
                                double[] tSpan,
                                int subSteps)
        Solve ODE using RK4 method with specified time points and sub-stepping.
        Parameters:
        f - The differential equation dy/dt = f(t, y)
        y0 - Initial condition
        tSpan - Array of time points where solution is desired
        subSteps - Number of internal steps between each user-specified time point. Higher values give better accuracy. Use 1 for no sub-stepping.
        Returns:
        Solution object containing t and y arrays

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method for command-line execution of the RK4Solver. This method demonstrates solving various differential equations.
        Parameters:
        args - Command-line arguments (not directly used for solving, but for demonstration).
